name: FinalGradeCalculator
0:
”Alexa, open final grade calculator and calculate what I need on my final”
”Alexa, open final grade calculator and calculate what I need on the final”
”Alexa, open final grade calculator and calculate my final grade”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: final grade calculator
des: This skill solves the timeless problem that countless students all over the world face near the end of a semester. What grade do I need to get on my final exam to get an A or a B? If this sounds like you, then fret not! Just open up this skill, tell Alexa your current grade, your desired final grade, the weight of your final exam, and you'll instantly have your answer! With the final grade calculator, you never have to guess how well you need to do on an exam ever again!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
